title: Car Crashes Are A Public Health Crisis. Autonomous Cars Are The Cure.
description:
Waymo has released data showing its autonomous cars are much safer than conventional cars. Other companies should do the same.

The post Car Crashes Are A Public Health Crisis. Autonomous Cars Are The Cure. appeared first on CleanTechnica.
